summary: The Nightingale’s Ring serves to make themselves invisible while in stealth mode. The novelty of this mod is that the ring forged the blacksmith's forge can be both right and left and can be worn as a second ring.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Calibri][size=3]NIGHTINGALE’S RING[/size][/font][/b][/center][size=3]
[font=Calibri]TheNightingale’s Ring serves to make themselves invisible while in stealth mode.
The novelty of this mod is that the
ring forged the blacksmith's forge can be both right and left and can be worn
as a second ring (that is, you can wear the right version as a ring right now
if you puts on another, or for the left version as left even if you
already
brought another). You will therefore understand that the prerequisite for this
mod is that it has already installed the mod Left Hand Rings by duggelz located
here:[/font]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21720/?][b][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21720/?[/u][/b][/url][/b][b], [/b]
[b]and the mod [/b][font=Calibri]Uninterrupted Invisibility[/font][font=Calibri] by [/font][b]meh321 located here:[/b]
[b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64541/?][u]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64541/?[/u][/url] .[/b]
Sorry for my bad English, but it is not my language. Thank you.[/size]
author: ag1963
